name: Setsuna
description:
"Where am I? What is this place? I must find my way home..."About

Setsuna is a 3D collectathon platformer about a cat who is trying to find his way back to his owner. Dodge obstacles, collect fish-shaped dry food, and uncover the story of Setsuna!

You are a cat who has awoken in a strange world. You don’t remember much other than the fact that your owner probably misses you. You should find a way back.

Controls
  • WASD to move
  • Spacebar to jump
  • ESC to pause
  • Hold left click while moving the mouse to rotate camera
  • E during certain prompts to skip cutscenes or interact

For now, only keyboard and mouse input is supported.

Installation

Download the zip file and extract it. It should result in a folder named "Setsuna". Open the folder and run the executable. You're all set!
